results.title: Panorama: the state wide screen [excerpts No. 1]
results.brief_description: Excerpts from the Panorama documentary on the State Film Centre of Victoria. Candid footage of the goings on at the S.F.C.V. in Carlton in the early sixties. Customer service, despatch operations, film retrieving, checking and cleaning, and free film screenings in urban and rural areas.
results.description: Excerpts from the Panorama documentary on the State Film Centre of Victoria. Candid footage of the goings on at the S.F.C.V. in Carlton in the early sixties. results.title: A Feeling of self worth
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Vandalism Task Force and Robin Young
results.brief_description: A feeling of self worth describes the approach taken at Monterey and the positive impact this has had on the school. Present and former staff and the parents of former students talk about the school as it used to be and the improvements that have been made.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Victoria. Vandalism Task Force and Robin Young

results.title: Bare
results.creator_credit: Amanda Roberts, Wild Iris Productions, Liz Baulch and Deborah Strutt
results.brief_description: There are misunderstandings aplenty in this award-winning Australian short when 2 gay boys accidentally catch their lesbian neighbours in an early morning clinch. High density living in all its revealing glory.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Amanda Roberts, Wild Iris Productions, Liz Baulch and Deborah Strutt

results.title: On guard
results.creator_credit: Susan Lambert, Digby Duncan and Red Heart Pictures
results.brief_description: A fast moving adventure about four women who conspire to sabotage the research program of Utero, a multinational firm engaged in reproductive engineering. They plan a midnight raid on Utero’s heavily guarded plant and as the time for the raid approaches, tensions between the four saboteurs increase.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Susan Lambert, Digby Duncan and Red Heart Pictures

results.title: One day at the park
results.creator_credit: Yasmin Blyth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: A terrible, life-threatening accident changed Yasmin Blyth’s life, allowing her to see it through new eyes and appreciate the simple things.

results.title: Becoming me
results.creator_credit: Tyson Cunningham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Tyson Cunningham can’t express himself, music does it for him. Although he has long given up dreams of fronting a band like his brother, music is still everything to him, and expresses his emotional life like nothing else.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tyson Cunningham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: When Tyson Cunningham can’t express himself, music does it for him. Although he has long given up dreams of fronting a band like his brother, music is still everything to him, and expresses his emotional life like nothing else.

results.title: On a Sunday he went fishing
results.creator_credit: Sarah Mifsud, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

video_links.name: On a Sunday he went fishing

results.brief_description: Sarah Mifsud’s father was an avid fisherman as was his father before him. Mifsud tells of the ordinary Sunday which turned tragically extraordinary for her family and the journey to rebuild in the aftermath.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sarah Mifsud, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Sarah Mifsud’s father was an avid fisherman as was his father before him. Mifsud tells of the ordinary Sunday which turned tragically extraordinary for her family and the journey to rebuild in the aftermath.

results.title: Ride
results.creator_credit: Matthew Hunt, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Matt Hunt talks candidly about his all-consuming addiction: riding bikes. It is an obsession that has changed the way he looks at the world, cost him physically and financially but one that he is not likely to give up soon.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Matthew Hunt, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Matt Hunt talks candidly about his all-consuming addiction: riding bikes. It is an obsession that has changed the way he looks at the world, cost him physically and financially but one that he is not likely to give up soon.
